hints.content:
To find the difference, we start with the length of $\purpleD{\text{Sparkle's horn}}$ and subtract the length of $\blueE{\text{Dazzle's horn}}$.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d63552cfd10165187a2421e5d3add26c45698d58)

$\purpleD{42}\text{ cm}-\blueE{14}\text{ cm} = \maroonD{\Box}\text{ cm}$

Let's subtract to find the difference.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8d3821506095ef14ae03a0a249359e9aa9ef1a69)

$\purpleD{42}\text{ cm}  - \blueE{14}\text{ cm}  = \maroonD{28}\text{ cm}$
Sparkle's horn is $\maroonD{28} \text{ cm}$ longer than Dazzle's horn.

question.content:
The lengths of $3$ unicorns' horns are listed in the table.

Unicorn | Horn length  
- | - | -
Sparkle | $42 \text { cm}$ 
Dazzle | $14 \text { cm}$ 
Glitter|  $34 \text { cm}$ 

**How much longer is Sparkle's horn than Dazzle's horn?** 
 
[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] $\text{cm}$
